eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing

Class VMP

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing.MessagePassingAlgorithm<NaturalParameters>
      • eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing.VMP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm, Sampler, java.io.Serializable

    public class VMP
extends MessagePassingAlgorithm<NaturalParameters>
implements InferenceAlgorithm, Sampler
    This class extends the class MessagePassingAlgorithm and implements the interfaces InferenceAlgorithm and Sampler. It handles and implements the Variational message passing (VMP) algorithm. Winn, J.M., Bishop, C.M.: Variational message passing. Journal of Machine Learning Research 6 (2005) 661â€“694.

    For an example of use follow this link http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#vmpexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
